task.title: The Calendar
task.shortdesc: View calender events using the accessible Calendar List View.

context.p: The Calendar gives users the options to display events using a monthly, weekly or daily view. These views are inaccessible for screen readers. As an accessible alternative users can view calender events using the Calendar List View. This list view can be accessed by performing the following steps:

step.cmd: Select the "Calendar" Application Section. By default the "Calendar View" Application Tab will be displayed.
In this view all calendar events are displayed in an accessible table.
